mapper.select: -- from mybatis SELECT "t_business_object"."object_code" AS "objectCode" , "t_business_object"."object_name" AS "objectName" , "t_business_object"."relate_table_row_id" AS "relateTableRowId" , "t_business_object"."change_operat" AS "changeOperat" , "t_business_object"."belong_module" AS "belongModule" , "t_business_object"."belong_system" AS "belongSystem" , "t_business_object"."relate_template_object" AS "relateTemplateObject" , "t_business_object"."etc" AS "etc" , "t_business_object"."row_id" AS "rowId" FROM "t_business_object" WHERE object_name = #{objectName}
